io.straas.android.sdk.circall.interfaces

Interface EventListener


  • public interface EventListener
    EventListener provides developer events about connection of a CircallManager. You could enable this listener by CircallManager.addEventListener(EventListener).

    All of these events would be invoked on UI thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(Exception error)
      Called when an error occurs during ongoing video call, that is CircallManager.getCircallState() returns CircallManager.STATE_CONNECTED.
      void onStreamAdded(CircallStream stream)
      Called when a new remote peer is connected with room and ready for subscribing.
      void onStreamPublished(CircallStream stream)
      Called when you publish a stream (CircallManager.publishWithCameraCapture(CircallPublishConfig)) or CircallManager.publishWithUrl(CircallPublishWithUrlConfig) successfully.
      void onStreamRemoved(CircallStream stream)
      Called when a remote peer stream disconnected from room.
      void onStreamSubscribed(CircallStream stream)
      Called when a new media stream is received from remote peer.
      void onStreamUpdated(CircallStream stream)
      Called when a remote peer stream is updated

    • Method Detail

      • onStreamAdded

        void onStreamAdded(CircallStream stream)
        Called when a new remote peer is connected with room and ready for subscribing. You could subscribe this stream for media streaming from remote peer by CircallManager.subscribe(CircallStream).
        Parameters:
        stream - the newly added remote stream, see CircallStream

      • onStreamPublished

        void onStreamPublished(CircallStream stream)
        Called when you publish a stream (CircallManager.publishWithCameraCapture(CircallPublishConfig)) or CircallManager.publishWithUrl(CircallPublishWithUrlConfig) successfully. You could subscribe this stream for media streaming from remote peer by CircallManager.subscribe(CircallStream) if needed.
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream you published, see CircallStream

      • onStreamSubscribed

        void onStreamSubscribed(CircallStream stream)
        Called when a new media stream is received from remote peer. You could draw the video data from this CircallStream to a CircallPlayerView by CircallPlayerView.setCircallStream(CircallStream).
        Parameters:
        stream - the subscribed remote stream, see CircallStream

      • onStreamRemoved

        void onStreamRemoved(CircallStream stream)
        Called when a remote peer stream disconnected from room.
        Parameters:
        stream - the removed remote stream, see CircallStream

      • onStreamUpdated

        void onStreamUpdated(CircallStream stream)
        Called when a remote peer stream is updated
        Parameters:
        stream - the updated remote stream, see CircallStream

      • onError

        void onError(Exception error)
        Called when an error occurs during ongoing video call, that is CircallManager.getCircallState() returns CircallManager.STATE_CONNECTED.
        Parameters:
        error - failure reason
